headline: Cloudflare is free of CAPTCHAs; Turnstile is free for everyone
keywords: Birthday Week, Product News, Turnstile, CAPTCHA, Speed & Reliability, Security, Bots
description: Now that we’ve eliminated CAPTCHAs at Cloudflare, we want to hasten the demise of CAPTCHAs across the internet. We’re thrilled to announce that Turnstile is generally available, and Turnstile’s ‘Managed’ mode is now completely free to everyone for unlimited use.
